ca.mcgill.ecse211.lab5

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.lab5.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides other classes with methods relevant for navigation, such as travelTo, turnTo and distance conversions.
    Author:
    Tony

      This method checks if the robot is currently navigating
